presets.name: 07 LVP
presets.template: @LIBD @ARR AND @DEP @ATIS [ATIS_CODE]. [OBS_TIME]. RWY IN USE 07. RWY @CC 5. 5. 5. CONTAMINANT WET .WET. WET. [TL]. OPERATIONAL INFORMATION. @LVP IN PROGRESS. [WIND] [VIS] [ARPT_COND] [PRESENT_WX] [CLOUDS] [TEMP] [DEW] [PRESSURE]. [NOTAMS].
